desc: Windows Phone 7 in Action is a hands-on guide to building mobile applications for WP7 using Silverlight, C#, and XNA. Written for developers who already know their way around Visual Studio, this book zips through the basics, such as writing code to dial the phone, writing emails, and sending text messages, and moves on to the nuts and bolts of building great phone apps. By working through the numerous examples and tutorials, you'll master the APIs used to work with a phone's sensors and hardware, such as the accelerometer, camera, touch screen, GPS, and microphone. You'll also tackle web services and applications that use location and push notification services.
title: Windows Phone 7 in Action
